item.title: Capri Holdings Ltd 10-K
item.description: Capri Holdings Ltd, which is in the Leather & Leather Products [3100] industry, SEC 10-K filing on May 26, 2021 had 41135 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 526 instances fiscal - 469 instances 2021 - 394 instances march - 391 instances million - 376 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
